Disclosure.name: Disclosure
Disclosure.description: Represents the disclosure details that a company shares, which can be included by a user in their response document.

AssessmentId.description: The assesment record that stores the responses submitted for the disclosure.

AuthoringMode.description: Specifies the authoring mode used to launch the disclosure authoring experience.

DisclosureDefVerDesc.description: The description of the disclosure definition version associated with the disclosure.

DisclosureDefVerNumber.description: The version number of the disclosure definition associated with the disclosure.

DisclosureDefinition.description: The disclosure definition associated with the disclosure.

DisclosureDefinitionVerId.description: The version of the disclosure definition associated with the disclosure.

DisclosureDocumentUrl.description: The URL of the final disclosure document that's used in the disclosure.

DisclosureTypeBodyLogo.description: The logo of the standard body related to a disclosure type to which an individual or a company is making a disclosure.

EndDate.description: The end date of the disclosure.

ExternalDocumentErrorMessage.description: The error associated with the launch of the external document.

ExternalDocumentLaunchStatus.description: The status of the external document launch.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PredefinedDisclosureDefVersion.description: Specifies the predefined disclosure definition version associated with the disclosure.

ReplicateResponsesFromId.description: The disclosure from where the responses are taken. The disclosure information is dependent on the disclosure type, definition, and a valid assessment context on the disclosure.

ShouldGenDrftRespDocFrEinstein.description: Indicates wether to generate the draft response document using Einstein Search for the disclosure.

StartDate.description: The start date of the disclosure.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the disclosure.

Year.description: The year for which the disclosure is done.
